definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pluck off (twigs, etc.), or out (NH=BH; Ar. qatafa pluck grapes; Targum [[קְטַף]], Syr. qt.ap; cf. As ḳatâpu, appar. pluck off);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms.[[קָטָָף]] Ez Eze 17:4 he [i.e. eagle, in fig.] plucked off twigs; 2 ms. [[וְקָטַפְתָּ֫]] De 23:26 (ears of grain, [[בְּיׇדֶָךָ]]); Impf. 1 S [[אֶקְטׂף]] Ez Eze 17:22 (subj. ´[[י]]:; acc. +[[מִן]] from); Pt. mpl. [[הַקּׂטְפִים]] Job 30:4 they who pluck out the mallow.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇקָּטֵב]] Job 8:12 it is not plucked off.
